mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALARM (ALR_NO, USER_NO, REF_TYPE, REF_NO, SEND_USER, ALR_MESSAGE) VALUES (SEQ_ALARM.nextval,#{userNo}, 3, #{replyNo},#{recNo},#{replyContent})
mapper.select: select REPLY_NO, R.USER_NO, R.FEED_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_AT, F.USER_NO AS REC_NO from reply R JOIN FEED F on R.FEED_NO = F.FEED_NO where R.FEED_NO =#{feedNo} AND R.USER_NO = #{loginUserNo} AND REPLY_AT=(SELECT MAX(REPLY_AT) FROM REPLY) ORDER BY REPLY_AT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY (REPLY_NO, USER_NO, FEED_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_AT) VALUES (SEQ_REPLY.nextval, #{loginUserNo}, #{feedNo}, #{replyContent},SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO, R.USER_NO, FEED_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_AT, NICK_NAME FROM REPLY R JOIN USER_PROFILE UP on R.USER_NO = UP.USER_NO WHERE FEED_NO=#{feedNo} order by REPLY_AT DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM REPLY WHERE FEED_NO = #{feedNo} AND REPLY_NO=#{replyNo}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM REPLY WHERE FEED_NO=#{feedNo}
